MemberSignature.Value: member this.PaddingMode : int with get, set
public virtual int PaddingMode { get; set; }
.property instance int32 PaddingMode

Docs.param:
padding mode, one of:
  • #PADDING_MODE_NEST to nest each layer inside the padding of the previous layer
  • #PADDING_MODE_STACK to stack each layer directly atop the previous layer
Docs.summary: Specifies how layer padding should affect the bounds of subsequent layers.

Property setter documentation:
